Pattern in Baldness

http://cloningmyhair.blogspot.com/2012/03/pattern-in-baldness.html

Basically Pattern in baldness is associated to genetics however still there are several male who are affected by this issue. it's true that genetically pattern baldness transfers from one generation of a family to succeeding generation. however this can be not end of world there's still hope. sometimes Pattern in baldness starts when 45 years aged however in some cases it starts too early from 20 to 26 years old aged that is kind of embarrassing. In such cases males face lots of marriage problems as a result of females don't prefer a bald husband.
